titles.title: A concurrent resolution recognizing the accomplishments of the Federal Aid in Wildlife Restoration Act in honor of its 50th anniversary.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.
Referred to Subcommittee on Fisheries and Wildlife Conservation and the Environment.
Subcommittee on Fisheries and Wildlife Conservation and the Environment Discharged.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.
Reported to House by House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries. Report No: 100-168.
Called up by House Under Suspension of Rules.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.
Received in the Senate and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

committee.subcommittee: Fisheries and Wildlife Conservation and the Environment
committee.name: House Merchant Marine and Fisheries

bill.summary: 5/28/1987--Introduced. Recognizes the accomplishments of the Federal Aid in Wildlife Restoration Act in enhancing, during the past 50 years, the knowledge, conservation, management, and habitat of U.S. wildlife resources, as well as hunter education. Commends hunters and shooters for their contributions to such Act's success.
